img.alt: Sofabed Parlor Room Living Area, Couch Facing TV

div.p: The Junior Parlor Suite is 764 sq. ft. and includes deluxe room amenities plus a refrigerator, microwave, bathrobes, and scenic city views. This non-smoking suite features a Sweet Dreams by DoubleTree king-sized bed. This plush, pillow-top bed boasts a triple-sheeted down blanket and is accented by five jumbo down pillows.

img.alt: Guest Room with Two Beds and HDTV

div.p: The spacious work area includes a desk and available WiFi. Print from the comfort of your guest room with our complimentary Printer-On solution. Enjoy your favorite tunes with our AM/FM digital clock radio with MP3 capability. The bathroom features a granite countertop, shower/tub combination, and curved shower rod. Combed-cotton terry and deluxe bath products further enhance your experience. For your convenience, this well-appointed room also features a hairdryer, coffeemaker with coffee, iron with ironing board, two dual-line phones with dataports, and digital thermostat.
